Html:
Hey guys,

I just download GraphSharp and it is very nice. I 've try example on youtube, everything works great. Please does anyone can point me to a sample

that shows how I can create a graph of vertices and edges and add events to vertices.


Thanks in advance for your help.

Regards

Joe

Hi joe awal, you can  download the source code of the control and then execute the example application. There you can see a lot of code very useful to understand the hoew the control works.

To attach an event to a graph, you can take a look at this discussion that show how to easily attach WPF event to a vertex control.

Enjoy!
